script_phases.name: Fix Module Map
script_phases.script: rm -rf "$TARGET_BUILD_DIR/$PRODUCT_NAME$WRAPPER_SUFFIX/PrivateHeaders" ; function replace() { export SEARCH="$1" && export REPLACE="$2" && ruby -p -i -e "gsub(ENV[\"SEARCH\"], ENV[\"REPLACE\"])" "$3" ; } ; replace "header \"imath.h\"" "" "${TARGET_BUILD_DIR}/${PRODUCT_NAME}${WRAPPER_SUFFIX}/Modules/module.modulemap" ; replace "header \"imath+additions.h\"" "" "${TARGET_BUILD_DIR}/${PRODUCT_NAME}${WRAPPER_SUFFIX}/Modules/module.modulemap"
